Incorrect operation of the movie preview pop-up window.
The movie preview pop-up window of incorrect size opens on screens with zoom levels of 80%, 100%, and 110%.
The movie preview pop-up window on the "My Library" page opens with incorrect content.
The website page is opened. https://goitstudentsworks.github.io/js_70_melvinsz/library.html#
Content from the "Home" page has been added to the "My Library" page after the 20th movie.
Open the movie preview pop-up window on the specified page with zoom levels of 80%, 100%, and 110%.
Inspect the size of the pop-up window.
Analyze the content of the pop-up window.

column1: The movie preview pop-up window is the wrong size with incorrect content.
The pop-up window with the movie preview is the correct size with the correct content.
This error reproduces on the following types of devices: Laptop, Tablet.

Incorrect highlighting of the buttons "Watched" and "Queue" on the "My Library" page.
When navigating to the "My Library" page, the "Watched" button is highlighted but the "Queue" section opens.
The website page is opened. https://goitstudentsworks.github.io/js_70_melvinsz/library.html#
Different content from the "Home" page has been added to the "Watched" and "Queue" sections.
Click on the "Queue" button on the "My Library" page.
Check if the content in the section has changed.

column1: When navigating to the "My Library" page, the "Watched" button is highlighted, but the "Queue" section opens.
When navigating to the "My Library" page, the "Queue" button is highlighted and the "Queue" section opens.
This error reproduces on all devices (Laptop, Tablet, Mobile).

column2: Volodymyr K.

Google Chrome, version 127.0.6533.72  Windows 10 Version 22H2
Incorrect functionality of buttons in the content preview pop-up window.

When adding content to the "Watched" section using the "Add to Watched" button in the pop-up window, the content is not removed from the "Queue" section and the corresponding "Add to Queue" button does not change.
The website page is opened. https://goitstudentsworks.github.io/js_70_melvinsz/library.html#
The pop-up window with content is open.
Click on the "Add to Watched" button in the pop-up window.
Click on the "Add to Queue" button in the pop-up window.
Check if the button "Add to Watched" has changed.

column1: When adding content to the "Watched" section, the content is not removed from the "Queue" section in the pop-up window, and the corresponding button does not change.
When adding content to the "Watched" section, the content is removed from the "Queue" section in the pop-up window, and the corresponding button changes.
This error reproduces on all devices (Laptop, Tablet, Mobile).
